alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:52AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pender, southeastern Bladen, northern Brunswick and northeastern Columbus Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1151 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Council, or 12 miles east of Whiteville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rowan, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Point Caswell, Hallsboro, Long Creek, Nakina, Redbug, Council, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, Phoenix, Riegelwood, Carvers, Old Dock, Montague, Rooks and Malpass Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender
